instance.description: Find flows for which a filter takes a particular behavior
instance.longDescription: This question searches for flows for which a filter (access control list) has a particular behavior. The behaviors can be: that the filter permits the flow (permit), that it denies the flow (deny), or that the flow is matched by a particular line (matchLine <lineNumber>). Filters are selected using node and filter specifiers, which might match multiple filters. In this case, a (possibly different) flow will be found for each filter

action.description: The behavior that you want evaluated. Options are: permit|deny|matchLine <line number>. Only one option should be selected

explain.description: Include a description of the flow space matching the query.

filters.description: Only evaluate filters that match this regex

headers.description: Packet header constraints on the flows being searched

invertSearch.description: Search for packet headers outside the specified headerspace, rather than inside the space.

nodes.description: Only evaluate filters present on nodes matching this regex

startLocation.description: Only consider specified locations as possible sources
